li.a: Hands On Courses for Non-Traditional Students

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
Students May Not:
• Have in-person contact with coaches.
• Require or suggest groups of participants to gather.
• Suggest or support “captain’s practices” or “open gyms.”
• Participate in tryouts or evaluations or receive feedback on their performance.

Guidlines from MSHSL:
Students May:
• Connect with coaches via electronic
• Receive optional individual workouts or optional individual skills training via electronic communication. • • Participate in virtual end of season activities like meetings.

div.h3: Sherry Hanson, Kimball FSD for Taher Inc.
div.p: If you are in need of meals for your kids, please remember we are here for you!! Please call 320-398-7700 ext. 1377 and leave a message. Meals will be delivered M-F (including May 1st and May 4th which are not distance learning days).
Loving the completed masks made by Ms. Winkelman's sewing students! Thanks for your hard work...you did an outstanding job!
KAHS is searching for a Tech Ed teacher to teach woods, welding, home repair, and more. Please spread the word! Email Nancy Bonnifield for more info: nancy.bonnifield@kimball.k12.mn.us
